about_the_game:
Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation...

  • Brazilian Soccer Player
  • Brazilian Flag Metallic
  • Brazilian Flag Decal
  • Brazilian Macaw

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
detailed_description:
Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of four unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation...

  • Brazilian Soccer Player
  • Brazilian Flag Metallic
  • Brazilian Flag Decal
  • Brazilian Macaw

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
legal_notice: (C) 2014 SCS Software. All brand names, trademarks, registered marks, logos, and symbols on vehicles in the game are property of their rightful owners. Used with kind permission.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 760-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT-class equivalent
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class or better
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 200 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible
